PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15682018-12-14,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Metal and Diamond Mining Effluent Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the METAL AND DIAMOND MINING EFFLUENT REGULATIONS in order to allow the use of water bodies frequented by fish that are part of the Mont-Wright Mine expansion project for the disposal of tailings and waste rock.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0280 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
